Workers digging an underground garage for a new hotel recentlydiscovered a hidden underground cavern, containing a hidden chamber housing a hidden treasure trove. 

The discovery was made at the site of the planned hotel, located in the heart of a bustling downtown neighborhood. As excavators worked under the ground, they stumbled upon a small structure that appeared to be the result of a hidden underground tunnel.

Excavators carefully opened the door and revealed a small, underground chamber.
